sub_title: Researcher | Chemistry | Science communication | Available for jobs involving science communication and research in organic, inorganic or analytical chemistry.
summary:
I'm an enthusiast chemist always looking for knowledge and challenge. I'm highly interested in a career path in scientific publishing (editor) or research positions related to organic, inorganic or analytical chemistry.

During my bachelor studies I was involved in volunteer work in science communication (creating activities for kids and teenagers) and in research related to organic chemistry and organometallic chemistry. For my master, I joined an Erasmus master program where I had the chance to study and obtain a multiple master degree from three different countries (France, Poland and Italy). I enjoyed the multicultural environment inside and outside the classroom. 

For my PhD, I joined the Organic Chemistry and Catalysis group at Utrecht University in the Netherlands. Under the supervision of Dr. Marc-Etienne Moret, I worked on nickel complexes bearing π-acceptor ligands as cooperative moieties.  I'm expecting to defend my thesis in 2023.
